definition: the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Lu
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
to have a pleasant journey (idiom)
to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
to live an exhausting journey
Belt and Road Initiative, Chinese government plan to provide finance and engineering expertise to build infrastructure across Eurasia and northeast Africa, unveiled in 2013
all the way/all along/since the start
(coll.) going on foot

sentences.english: When he says "take care" the words are inflected with humanity.
sentences.chinese: 当他说‘一路小心’，言语间充满了人性。

sentences.english: Dear colleagues, a pleasant journey, I remember thinking of us, always come back together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的同事，一路顺风，记得想念我们，常回来聚聚。

sentences.english: We ate half a jin of roast chestnuts, had a nap and soon arrived in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 一路上吃了半斤炒栗子，睡了一会儿觉，就到了北京。

sentences.english: I'm the lady you've looked for, write to me, and escape.
sentences.chinese: 那么我是阿谁你要找的人，给我上书，咱们一路私逃。

sentences.english: The driver is talkative and a good guide and had been working in Guangdong before.
sentences.chinese: 司机开朗，曾在广东打过工，一路是个好向导。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I hitchhiked my way to a small village several miles away from London.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我一路搭乘便车去离伦敦几英里外的一个小镇。

sentences.english: All the way in the train the rails kept singing, "You're going to see Daddy-Long-Legs."
sentences.chinese: 一路上，铁轨都在唱着“你就要见到长腿叔叔了。”

sentences.english: We all trials and hardships to walk, past experience has stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我们一路风雨兼程地走来，过去的经历已经定格。

sentences.english: One day, I made an appointment with Wang Ping togo to the bookstore together on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我和王萍相约周日一路去书店。

sentences.english: You must use a gas having about 80 % of the higher range full scale value.
sentences.chinese: 你必须使用一路气，满足满量程值80%的位置。

sentences.english: Going straight with this ridiculous world and stumble over this lonely world, finally they meet at the jail….
sentences.chinese: 在这个荒诞而寂寞的世界中一路前行，跌跌撞撞。

sentences.english: Don't indulge in momentary pleasure but beg a pleasant journey.
sentences.chinese: 不逞一时之快，只求一路平安。

sentences.english: According to Thoman, food waste and yard waste are currently all dumped in a pile together.
sentences.chinese: 托曼说，此刻食物垃圾和庭院销毁物都堆放在一路。

sentences.english: Longtze remained in contact but rounded the windward mark in last position.
sentences.chinese: 龙之子号一路紧跟但还是最后一个绕标。

sentences.english: He was so eager to get to the game that he burned up the road all the way.
sentences.chinese: 他急于赶去看比赛，所以一路上风驰电掣般地开车。

sentences.english: We walked hand and hand with Caitlin all the way to the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 我们带着凯特琳一路保龄球场手和手。

definition: all the way/all along/since the start
on the road/on a journey/road surface
along the way/the duration of a journey
(literary) to go forward
to go along/to follow
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
along the sides of the road/by the wayside
surname Lu
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
en route
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
road direction/(fig.) direction/path
incessant
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
northward/facing north
